name: HVM Advertisement paper
description:
'High Value Metrics is proud to present it's latest HVM weapons line!' 
a broad number of images of weapons are placed across the flier, 
a picture of a pistol named HVM 001, 
a frail looking SMG named HVM 002, 
a sturdy but clunky assault rifle named HVM 005 G-Class, 
a very heavy looking LMG called HVM 008, 
and a shotgun across the background with 'HVM 004, where nanomaterials make the impossible come reality' written under it as 25 shotgun shells are placed under it, 
all weapons have green and light brown digital pattern camo panels ontop of very dark gray internals.

name: HVM 001
description:
the HVM 001 is the first gun manufactured by High Value Metrics (HVM) 
it is the weakest gun in the line of weapons produced by this company. 
it uses a small caliber ammunition type, and looks like a futuristic Glock-shaped pistol that features its magazine placed under the barrel similar to the Mauser C96 with a stylish green camo pattern.

name: HVM 002
description:
the HVM 002 is the second gun manufactured by High Value Metrics (HVM) 
it's the weakest SMG in the line of weapons produced by this company. 
it uses the same small caliber ammunition as the HVM 001, and is a bullpup SMG possibly modeled after an Uzi or an MP7 with a fixed stock, a vertical foregrip and an unused top rail with a stylish green camo pattern.

name: HVM 004
description:
the HVM 004 is the fourth gun, and first shotgun, manufactured by High Value Metrics (HVM). we are not sure why there isn't a third weapon in the line. 
it's a very weak shotgun copared to it's competitors, but it's unreal use of some sort of compression or nano technology inside it's chamber makes this shotgun capable of holding up to 25 shells, but takes long to reload. 
this shotgun is possibly based on Beneli M4 (due to its famous semi-auto firing capability) with a gunstock grip and very squared green look.

name: HVM 005 G-Class
description:
the HVM 005 G-Class is an assault rifle produced by High Value Metrics (HVM) 
it's the weakest assault rifle compared to it's competitors. 
it uses the same small caliber ammunition as the HVM 001 and HVM 002, it's a bullpup rifle, it is inspired by the L85 or the FAMAS with a blocky design with a stylish green camo pattern.

name: HVM 008
description:
the HVM 008 is a low class LMG produced by High Value Metrics (HVM) 
it's the weakest LMG compared to it's competitors. it uses the same small caliber ammunition as the HVM 001 and HVM 002 
the HVM 008 is possibly inspired off of the combination of the M60 (appearance) and the MG34 (using drums as feed system) with a blocky design with a stylish green camo pattern.

name: Ronson 45
description:
the Ronson 45 is the only pistol manufactured by Ronson.
One of the most powerful commercially available hand guns. What it lacks in its relatively small clip size it makes up for in sheer stopping power
it has multiple blue panels on top of a black build.

name: Ronson 50
description:
the Ronson 50 is an almost unreal SMG produces by Ronson.
Nicknamed 'Boneshaker' the 50 is an SMG that uses the LBM round making for a very manouverable yet loud and powerful small weapon.
it has a blue panel on top of it's dark frame, it has a small grip and a base red dot sight with a rail to mount another sight, it also has a quite balanced rounded stock.

name: Ronson 55
description:
the Ronson 55 is an almost unreal SMG produces by Ronson. it's the successor to the Ronson 50.
Twin 'recoilless' alternating barrels allow for accuracy and an extremely high rate of fire. One of the most innovative and deadly submachine guns available anywhere.
it has a blue panel on top of it's dark frame, it has a small grip and a base red dot sight with no rail to mount another sight, it also has a quite balanced rounded stock.

name: Ronson 65-a
description:
the Ronson 65-a is an assault rifle produced by Ronson. it looks more like an smg but the weapon is advertised as an assault rifle, and as such the 'a' in the name cand stand for 'assault'.
Most soldiers know Ronson for the 65-a assault rifle. Perfectly balanced stock and narrow bore combine to create a very easy to use and accurate weapon.
it has a blue panel on top of it's dark frame, it has a small grip and a base red dot sight with no rail to mount another sight, it also has a quite balanced rounded stock.

name: Ronson 70
description:
the Ronson 70 is an assault rifle produced by Ronson.
Ronson's top of the range assault rifle. Highly tuned electromechanics generate incredibly accurate and powerful plasma bolts.
it has a blue panel on top of it's dark frame, it has a small grip and a rail to mount a sight, it also has a quite balanced stock. the build can resemble an M16

name: Ronson LBM
description:
the Ronson LBM is a heavy LMG produced by Ronson.
Ronson Large Bore Machine Gun. Uses heavy clip instead of belt to accommodate extra large rounds, the LBM can devastate most targets with ease.
it has a blue panel on top of it's dark frame, it has a small grip and a rail to mount a sight, it also has a quite balanced stock. it also features an underbarrel bipod, making it impossible to mount anything under the barrel.

name: RIA 313
description:
the RIA 313 is one of the first pistols designed by Rubicon Industries 
it's a very light pistol and uses a small caliber ammunition type 
the weapon looks like a futuristic pistol that appears to be a combination of the M9 or SIG-Sauer P226 for its look and the Desert Eagle for its size, a large muzzle and a pair of re-designed sights, the weapon has a sleek dark gray and black metallic look to it

name: RIA 1010
description:
the RIA 1010 is one of the last pistols designed by Rubicon Industries before the cataclysm 
it's a very light pistol and uses a medium ammunition type 
the weapon looks like a possible variant of the RIA 313 with a slightly smaller size, a larger clip, a compensator and a unique grip/flashlight on the bottom, the weapon has a sleek dark gray and black metallic look to it

name: RIA 7
description:
the RIA 7 is a lightweight smg developed by Rubicon Industries 
it's a very light smg and uses five-seven's 5.7mm ammunition 
the weapon is a futuristic submachine gun which is similar to the MP5 due to its look. It has a short barrel, a slightly large magazine and a short buttstock, the weapon has a sleek dark gray and black metallic look to it

name: RIA T7
description:
the RIA T7 is a lightweight smg developed by Rubicon Industries 
it's a very light smg upgraded from it's brother, the RIA 7, and uses five-seven's 5.7mm ammunition
 the weapon is a futuristic submachine gun which is similar to the MP5 due to its look. It has a short barrel, a slightly large magazine and a short buttstock, the weapon has a sleek dark gray and black metallic look to it

name: RIA 20 Para
description:
The RIA 20 Para is a light assault rifle produced by Rubicon Industries 
The RIA 20 Para is a futuristic rifle with the size of an SMG 
This makes it quite similar to the AKS-74U (an assault rifle that is popular and famous for its high power and small size), which is a variant of the AK-74, which replaces the AKM, a modified version of the latter. It has a telescopic sight and possible sling mounts

name: RIA 20 DSC
description:
The RIA 20 DSC is a light assault rifle produced by Rubicon Industries 
The RIA 20 DSC is a futuristic rifle, it's a bulkier & longer version of the RIA 20 Para. It has a different buttstock, barrel, telescopic sight, a quite unique magazine and a short muzzle

name: RIA 20 Striker
description:
The RIA 20 Striker is a light assault rifle produced by Rubicon Industries 
The RIA 20 Striker uses the same structure of the RIA 20 DSC with a longer muzzle, the same telescopic sight of the Para model, a more realistic magazine design. It also has a red glowing line on its body

name: RIA Trident
description:
The RIA Trident is a heavy assault rifle produced by Rubicon Industries 
The RIA Trident is a futuristic rifle with its body based off of the M249, which is a LMG. It has a realistic buttstock, a rear sight and a visible ejection port, but with no bolt handle. It also has three barrels, each coloured differently to signify its damage type

name: RIA 30 Strikeforce
description:
the RIA 30 Strikeforce is the only shotgun manufactured by Rubicon Industries 
The RIA 30 Strikeforce's design is similar to a sawn-off Ithaca 37 shotgun in terms of appearance. It has no front and rear sight and has a handguard that appears to be a shotgun pump on first glance.
 which is not

name: RIA 40
description:
The RIA 40 is a LMG produced by Rubicon Industries 
The RIA 40 looks similar to the GPMG M240 with a telescopic sight, the RIA 40 has a smaller magazine compared to the other LMGs, but it packs a harder punch.

name: RIA T40
description:
The RIA 40 is the second LMG produced by Rubicon Industries 
The RIA T40 is simply a slightly re-designed version of RIA 40. In addition, it has some glowing red lines, the RIA T40 has a smaller magazine compared to the other LMGs, but it packs an even harder punch.

name: RIA 45
description:
The RIA 45 is a LMG produced by Rubicon Industries 
it's an attempt to produce a lighter version of the RIA40. the RIA 45 Para is modeled after its linemate, the RIA 40. It has a telescopic sight as well. The only things that makes it different from the RIA 45 is a hollow buttstock and a shorter barrel

name: RIA 50
description:
The RIA 50 is a sniper rifle produced by Rubicon industries 
The RIA 50 appears to be a futuristic sniper rifle based on the Sako TRG-42 with a fitted Muzzle Break. However, the RIA 50 does not have a bolt like its possible real-life counterpart, most likely due to the fact that the rifle is fully automatic

name: CM 202
description:
The CM 202 is a pistol manufactured by Critical Mass 
The CM 202 is weaker than his brothers (the CM 205 and the CM 225), Its under-barrel magazine fed design is similar to the Mauser C96 and the TEC-9, despite the use of a very high caliber the magazines can hold a decent ammount of ammunition.

name: CM 205
description:
The CM 205 is a pistol manufactured by Critical Mass 
The CM 205 seems to be a modified version of the CM 202, having a more detailed build on the exterior, a larger magazine and a telescopic sight, Its under-barrel magazine fed design is similar to the Mauser C96 and the TEC-9.
the choice of using a small caliber makes this weapon's magazine hold more bullets, while the internals make the bullet travels twice as fast. also the small caliber and powerful internals make this weapons able to shoot automatically

name: CM 225
description:
The CM 225 is a pistol manufactured by Critical Mass 
The CM 205 seems to be a modified version of the CM 202, being more detailed in build and having more size on containing the much larger clip, Its under-barrel magazine fed design is similar to the Mauser C96 and the TEC-9.
the choice of using a small caliber makes this weapon's magazine hold more bullets, also being able to hold more bullets than its predecessor, while the internals make the bullet travels twice as fast. also the small caliber and powerful internals make this weapons able to shoot automatically

name: CM 307
description:
The CM 307 is an SMG manufactured by Critical Mass 
The CM 307 looks like an oversized squared desert eagle, it holds very little ammunition, but its massive firerate and very little recoil make it an effective weapon against armored enemies. it's covered in white paneling with gray lines and a bright blue LED, all placed on top of a black structure

name: CM 330
description:
The CM 330 is an SMG manufactured by Critical Mass 
The CM 330 is the upgraded version of it's predecessor, the CM 307, it's looks all around the same but it holds it's magazine slightly diagonally away from its handle. it holds very little ammunition, but its massive firerate and very little recoil make it an effective weapon against armored enemies. it's covered in white paneling with gray lines and a bright blue LED, all placed on top of a black structure

name: CM 351 Sunflare
description:
The CM 351 Sunflare is an SMG manufactured by Critical Mass 
The CM 351 is an attempt from CM to upgrade the CM 307's magazine size, it's looks all around the same but it's magazine is covered by a white holder placed inf ront of the grip and can use slightly longer magazines.  its massive firerate and very little recoil make it an effective weapon against armored enemies. it's covered in white paneling with gray lines and a bright blue LED, all placed on top of a black structure

name: CM Gigavolt
description:
The CM Gigavolt is an assault rifle manufactured by Critical Mass 
The CM Gigavolt is an assault rifle that looks quite heavy but instead is relatively light, it doesn't have a forward grip and has an integrated sight but has a rail to install a secon sight. it's covered in white paneling with gray lines and a bright blue LED in the middle and multiple smaller leds on the sides of the barrel, all placed on top of a black structure

name: CM 401 Planet Stormer
description:
The CM 401 Planet Stormer is an assault rifle manufactured by Critical Mass 
The CM 401 is an assault rifle that looks quite heavy but instead is relatively light, it has been manufactured after the CM Gigavolt to compensate it's lack of easy mag removal. it's covered in white paneling with gray lines and a bright blue LED in the middle, all placed on top of a black structure

name: CM 440 Titan
description:
The CM 440 Titan is an assault rifle manufactured by Critical Mass 
The CM Titan has been manufactured after the CM Gigavolt to compensate it's lack of easy mag removal and also make it more  versatile, it has two slots to add underbarrer components and has easier carrying capability. it's covered in white paneling with gray lines and a bright blue LED in the middle, all placed on top of a black structure

name: CM 451 Starburst
description:
The CM 451 Starburst is an assault rifle manufactured by Critical Mass 
The CM 451 is an assault rifle that looks quite heavy but instead is relatively light, it has been manufactured after the CM Gigavolt to compensate it's lack of easy mag removal and compatability with an even bigger magazine. it's covered in white paneling with gray lines and a bright blue LED in the middle and some LEDs on the barrel sides, all placed on top of a black structure

name: Sub-Light COM2 (CM)
description: Sublight COM2 rounds travel the last meter or so at very high speeds through 'Centre Of Mass Displacement' technology. Recorded speeds of the 127mm COM2 rounds are close to 100,000 meters per second. Enough to leave a big hole in just about anything. it's covered in white paneling with gray lines and a bright blue LED in the middle and some LEDs on the barrel sides, all placed on top of a black structure

name: CM 505
description:
The CM 505 is a LMG produced by critical mass, 
the CM 505 delivers a punishing rate of fire with incredible stopping power. A massive belt of rounds keeps it shooting harder, for longer. this weapon has a bright LED on it's side and uses a cylindrical shaped drum magazine.

name: CM 530 BabyCOM
description:
The CM 530 BabyCOMis a LMG produced by critical mass, 
the CM 530 BabyCOM delivers a punishing rate of fire with incredible stopping power. A massive belt of rounds keeps it shooting harder, for longer. it also uses COM (Center Of Mass) technology to increase the bullet's speed and damage. this weapon has a bright LED on it's side and uses a cylindrical shaped drum magazine.

name: Hotspot
description: the Hotspot uses intensified microwave energy to destroy organic targets easily, Although the Hotspot is a laser, it still has a range. Because of this, the laser beam can terminate in midair.

name: Shredder
description: the Shredder is a unique weapon produced by Rancor\, it features a small magazine at the bottom to load it's unique type of ammo, circular blades.

name: Poison Claw
description:
the Poison Claw is one of the only pistol designed by Rancor 
the weapon can be inspired by the look of the Vita-Saw from TF2n
it has a huge razor sharp blade under the weapon making it impossible to mount underbarrel accessories, and a small liquid tank on top covering the sights, the small liquid tank hold multiple liters of acid concentrated in an atomic shrinker enivoment, making for an effectively endless source of acid, the acid is then poured inside the bullet as you press the trigger to shoot off a bullet of concentrated acid inside of the enemy.

name: Mixmaster
description:
the Mixmaster is an assault rifle produced by Rancor 
it shoots super powered molted plasma from the air using battery power and has the unique ability to shoot two flechettes per trigger pull 
This rifle is often designated as a crowd control gun thanks to the flechette, the metal weapon build is covered in metal spikes on top of it's red metal plates placed on top of the black metal frame

name: Hard Thorn
description:
the Hard Thorn is an assault rifle produced by Rancor 
it shoots high caliber bullets, using super speed technology to burst the bullet in multiple shreds behaving like a shotgun with the same power and range of an assault rifle. 
This rifle is often designated as a crowd control gun thanks to the high spread and range, the metal weapon build is covered in metal spikes on top of it's red metal plates placed on top of the black metal frame.
this weapon has a sharp blade with multiple spikes under it's barrel, making it impossible to attach underbarrel modifications but a very effective melee weapon.

name: Heartburn
description:
the Heartburn is an assault rifle manufactured by Rancor 
the bullets fired from this weapon are molten before exiting the muzzle using high powered molten metal glowing on the sides of the barrel, this molten iron does not provide heat outside of the weapon's build
 the metal weapon build is covered in metal spikes on top of it's red metal plates placed on top of the black metal frame, it has five razor sharp spikes under and above the barrel making it impossible to mount underbarrel modifications, also on the sides and on the front of the barrel there are bright red glowing lines and circles reminding you about it's unending molten power.

name: Stripper
description:
the Stripper is a heavy automatic shotgun manufactured by Rancor, The Stripper is lever action like the 1887 Shockfield (even though the Stripper is still fully automatic, oddly enough)
the shotgun has a bayonet like blade under the barrel, but it's small enough so that it's possible to mount an underbarrel modification.
